NK015(ba)003:0: tshe dpag med lung lugs kyi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus dbang chog dang bcas pa bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)003:2: rgyal ba kun gyi gsung rdo rje /
NK015(ba)003:4: / 'chi med mchog stsol lhag pa'i lhar //
NK015(ba)003:5: yongs bzhengs mgon der gus btud nas //
NK015(ba)003:6: sgrub thabs snying po dril ba bshad /
NK015(ba)003:8: / 'dir sangs rgyas gsang ba'i lugs kyi tshe dpag med
NK015(ba)003:9: lung lugs kyi sgrub thabs dang 'brel bar dbang bskur
NK015(ba)003:10: la gsum ste / sbyor ba yo byad kyi shoms /
NK015(ba)003:12: byin rlabs dbang gi cho ga'o //
NK015(ba)003:13: dang po yo byad bshams pa ni /
NK015(ba)003:14: stegs bu'i khar man+dala khyams spangs pa'i sgo bzhi rta
NK015(ba)003:15: babs brgyad ma spyi mthun gyi lte bar ling tshe
NK015(ba)003:16: dgu pad 'dab brgyad kyis bskor ba rigs dang mthun
NK015(ba)003:17: pa'i tshon gyis bris pa'i dbus su many+dzi'i khar rin
NK015(ba)003:18: po che'i bum pa chas ldan snying po lnga'i bcud
NK015(ba)003:19: kyis gang ba'i khar tshe'i 'brang rgyas rdo rje rgya
NK015(ba)003:20: gram dang nyi zlas mtshan pa bzhag /
NK015(ba)003:21: de'i rgyab tu tshe mda' rgod sgro ma dar le brgan dang me long btags pa bkod /
NK015(ba)003:22: tshe ril dang tshe chang ni gong gi tshe 'brang gi ril bu dang /
NK015(ba)003:23: bum bcud kyis kyang 'thus mod spro na de'i g.yas g.yon du logs su bshams kyang legs /
NK015(ba)003:24: gang ltar yang zhabs bsil bzhi bsnol sman gtor dang
NK015(ba)003:25: bcas pas mtha' bskor las bum rdor dril sogs yo
NK015(ba)003:28: sgyu 'phrul zhi ba'i sbyor ba'i chos rnams sngon du 'gro ba'am /
NK015(ba)003:31: mchod rdzas rnams ram yam kham gis sbyang /
NK015(ba)003:32: a d+h+au pu a gan rnams zhu ba las /
NK015(ba)003:33: zhabs bsil bdug spos me tog mar me dri chab thogs pa'i lha mo nam mkha' gang bar gyur /
NK015(ba)003:35: sman gtor rnams a las byung ba'i ka p+aa la
NK015(ba)003:36: bcud dang bcas pa me rlung gis sbyangs ye shes
NK015(ba)003:37: kyi bdud rtsi bstim nas 'bru gsum gyi byin gyis
NK015(ba)003:38: brlabs / yan lag brgyad pa'i rgyun bshags tsam sngon du 'gro bas /
NK015(ba)003:39: swa b+h+aa was stong par sbyang /
NK015(ba)003:40: stong ba'i ngang las e yam bam lam sum ram
NK015(ba)003:41: b+h+r+aum zhes brjod pa'i nam mkha' rlung chu sa gzhi
NK015(ba)003:42: ri rab me dkyil dang bcas pa'i dbus su /
NK015(ba)003:43: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+ny+aa na tsakra man+da la b+h+r+aum /
NK015(ba)003:44: ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang
NK015(ba)003:45: gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa rta bab brgyad dang ldan
NK015(ba)003:46: pa'i dbus pho brang ling tshe dgu pa pad+ma 'dab
NK015(ba)003:48: tshad dang mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa
NK015(ba)003:49: dwangs shing sgrib pa med pa'i 'od zer kun tu
NK015(ba)003:50: 'bar ba bde ba can gyi zhing khams lta bu
NK015(ba)003:51: gyur / de'i dbus su rma byas bteg pa'i rin
NK015(ba)003:52: po che'i khri la pad+ma dang nyi zla brtsegs pa
NK015(ba)003:53: gyur / / phyogs mtshams kyi ling tshe dang pad
NK015(ba)003:54: 'dab brgyad sgo bzhi rnams su pad+ma dang nyi gdan
NK015(ba)003:55: gyur / / re re / gdan dbus ma'i steng du rang rig +aahdamara po 'bar ba /
NK015(ba)003:58: sems can thams cad kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa bsal /
NK015(ba)003:60: tshur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK015(ba)003:62: rang nyid bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dang ye
NK015(ba)003:63: shes dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar po zhal
NK015(ba)003:65: zhi zhing 'dzum pa'i ngang tshul can /
NK015(ba)003:66: phyag g.yon mnyam gzhag gis 'chi med bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa dang /
NK015(ba)003:67: g.yas rdo rje rgya gram bum pa'i kha bkab pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)003:68: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
NK015(ba)003:69: de'i thugs ka nas g.yon gyi barla'i steng du p+aam dmar po chad /
NK015(ba)003:71: yum gos dkar mo g.yas mda' dar le brgan g.yab cing /
NK015(ba)003:72: g.yon bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams pa /
NK015(ba)003:73: gnyis ka'ang mtshan dpe'i lang tsho 'bar zhing dar gyi chas gos lnga dang /
NK015(ba)003:74: rin po che'i rgyan brgyad de zhi ba'i rgyan chas bcu gsum gyis spras pa'o //
NK015(ba)003:75: ling tshe brgyad kyi phyogs bzhir l+aam m+aam m+aum t+aam dang mtshams bzhir l+aam m+aam m+aum t+aam rnams las /
NK015(ba)003:76: shar du spyan ma dkar mo /
NK015(ba)003:77: lhor m+aa ma k+ai ser mo /
NK015(ba)003:78: nub tu dbyings phyug ma sngon mo /
NK015(ba)003:79: byang du sgrol ma ljang gu /
NK015(ba)003:80: bzhi ka'ang g.yas tshe'i bum pa dang g.yon dril bu 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)003:81: mer rgyas 'debs ma dkar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs pa /
NK015(ba)003:82: bden bral du tshe 'phel ma ser mo kha t+w+aam /
NK015(ba)003:83: rlung du rmongs byed ma dmar mo rgyal mtshan /
NK015(ba)003:84: dbang ldan du za byed ma ljang gu rdor dril 'dzin pa'o //
NK015(ba)003:85: de'i phyi rol gyi pad 'dab brgyad kyi phyogs bzhir
NK015(ba)003:86: h+aum t+r+aam h+r+aih+aah mtshams bzhir d+h+au pu a gan rnams
NK015(ba)003:87: las / shar du l+aa s+ye ma dkar mo me long /
NK015(ba)003:88: lhor m+aa l+ye ma ser mo phreng ba /
NK015(ba)003:89: nub tu g+airti ma dmar mo pi wam /
NK015(ba)003:90: byang du n+airti ma ljang gu rnga yab 'dzin pa'o //
NK015(ba)003:91: shar lhor bdug spos ma dkar ser spos khang /
NK015(ba)003:92: lho nub tu me tog ma dmar ser me tog gi phreng ba /
NK015(ba)003:93: nub byang du mar me ma dmar ljang mar me /
NK015(ba)003:94: byang shar du dri chab ma dkar ljang dri'i dung phor 'dzin pa'o //
NK015(ba)003:96: shar sgor lcags kyu ma dkar mo lcags kyu /
NK015(ba)003:97: lho sgor zhags pa ma ser mo zhags pa /
NK015(ba)003:98: nub sgor lcags sgrog ma dmar mo lcags sgrog /
NK015(ba)003:99: byang sgor dril bu ma ljang gu dril bu 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)003:100: thams cad kyang lha'i na chung lang tsho gsar pa'i
NK015(ba)003:101: nyams can phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis
NK015(ba)003:102: brgyan te skyil krung phyed pa'i gar stabs kyis rol
NK015(ba)003:103: pa'o // de thams cad kyi dpral bar /
NK015(ba)003:105: h+aum las 'od zer 'phros pas ye shes kyi 'khor
NK015(ba)003:106: lo mdun gyi nam mkhar badz+ra sa m+aa dzah zhes
NK015(ba)003:107: pas spyan drangs / dzahh+aum bam hohs dgug gzhug bcings te mnyes par byas /
NK015(ba)003:108: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta b+h+yo bi shwa mu
NK015(ba)003:109: khe b+h+yahsarba tat+kham ut+ga te s+pha ra na hi mam
NK015(ba)003:110: ga ga na kham sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)003:111: +aa ha ra +aa ha ra sarba bid+y+aa d+ha ra
NK015(ba)003:112: p+au dzi te na mahs man+ta bud+d+ha n+aam ga ga
NK015(ba)003:113: na kham sa ma ye swa h+aa /
NK015(ba)003:114: +amo sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga d+h+au pee d+h+au /
NK015(ba)003:115: +amo sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga push+pe pu /
NK015(ba)003:116: +amo sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga +aa lo ke h+r+aih +amo sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga gan+d+he gan /
NK015(ba)003:117: zhes kun bzang zhabs bsil bzhi bsnol dang bdud rtsis kyang mchod do //
NK015(ba)003:120: bcom ldan mgon po rdo rje tshe dpag med //
NK015(ba)003:121: sgrib pa'i d+r+wa ba ma lus sel ba'i sku //
NK015(ba)003:122: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes sku mnga' ba //
NK015(ba)003:123: mnyam nyid rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)003:124: bcom ldan gsung mchog rnam par dag pa'i gsung //
NK015(ba)003:125: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gsung mnyam nyid gsung la phyag bcom ldan thugs mchog rnam par dag pa'i thug //
NK015(ba)003:126: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnyam nyid thugs la zhes pas bstod /
NK015(ba)003:128: snying ga'i sa bon bzla bya'i sngags phreng gis bskor ba las 'od zer 'phros /
NK015(ba)003:129: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod /
NK015(ba)003:131: sems can thams cad kyi tshe dang bsod nams ye
NK015(ba)003:132: shes 'byung bzhi'i mdangs bcud thams cad bsdus te snying
NK015(ba)003:133: ga'i sngags phreng la thim par bsam nas /
NK015(ba)003:134: pun+ye pun+ye ma ha pun+ye a pa ra mi ta +aa yur+dz+ny+aa na sarba ro pa tsit+te s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)003:136: bdag gi thugs ka nas h+aum spros pa yum gyi
NK015(ba)003:137: mkha' nang du rdorje rgya gram steng 'og gnyis su
NK015(ba)003:138: gyur pa'i bar du nyi zla kha sbyor gyi lte
NK015(ba)003:139: bar tshe'i rang bzhin thig le dkar po n+ris mtshan
NK015(ba)003:140: par bsam nas / badz+ra mug ti hah rang gi
NK015(ba)003:141: thugs ka nas pho nya nam mkha' gang bar 'phros
NK015(ba)003:142: par bsam nas / / 'khor 'das snod bcud kyi
NK015(ba)003:143: tshe bcud thams cad bsdus te mkha' nang gi tshe
NK015(ba)003:144: rten la thim par bsam nas sngags kyi mgo drangs
NK015(ba)003:146: nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma ni ye nas rnam par dag /
NK015(ba)003:147: rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ni ye nas skye shi med //
NK015(ba)003:148: rin chen dbyings phyug ma ni dgos 'dod re ba skong //
NK015(ba)003:149: pad+ma dbyings phyug ma ni ye nas chags dang bral //
NK015(ba)003:150: las kyi dbyings phyug ma ni mngon spyod phrin las mdzad //
NK015(ba)003:151: dbyings phyug chen mo khyed rnams kyis //
NK015(ba)003:152: rdo rje tshe yi dngos grub stsol //
NK015(ba)003:155: shar gyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma //
NK015(ba)003:156: gsang ba'i lha mo rgyas 'debs ma //
NK015(ba)003:157: rigs kyi lha mo sangs rgyas spyan //
NK015(ba)003:158: phyag rgya'i lha mo l+aa s+ye ma //
NK015(ba)003:159: mchod pa'i lha mo d+h+au pe ma /
NK015(ba)003:161: / 'gugs pa'i lha mo lcags kyu ma //
NK015(ba)003:162: tshe bdag chen mo khyed rnams kyis //
NK015(ba)003:163: shar phyogs dri za'i lag nas tshe khug la //
NK015(ba)003:164: shar lho me lha'i lag nas dpal skyobs shig /
NK015(ba)003:165: rdo rje mi 'gyur tshe yi dngos grub stsol //
NK015(ba)003:167: lho yi phyogs nas gsang ba'i lha mo tshe 'phel ma //
NK015(ba)003:168: rigs kyii lha mo m+aa ma k+ai /
NK015(ba)003:169: phyag rgya'i lha mo m+aa l+ye ma //
NK015(ba)003:170: mchod pa'i lha mo push+pe ma /
NK015(ba)003:172: / 'ching ba'i lha mo zhags pa ma //
NK015(ba)003:173: tshe bdag chen mo lho phyogs gshin rje'i lho nub srin po'i rdo rje mi 'gyur h+aum /
NK015(ba)003:174: nub kyi phyogs nas gsang ba'i lha mo rmongs byed ma //
NK015(ba)003:175: rigs kyi lha mo gos dkar mo //
NK015(ba)003:176: phyag rgya'i lha mo g+airti ma //
NK015(ba)003:177: mchod pa'i lha mo +aa lo ke /
NK015(ba)003:178: sdom pa'i lha mo lcags sgrog ma //
NK015(ba)003:179: tshe bdag nub phyogs klu dbang nub byang rlung lha'i rdo rje mi 'gyur h+aum /
NK015(ba)003:180: byang gi phyogs nas gsang ba'i lha mo za byed ma //
NK015(ba)003:181: rigs kyi lha mo dam tshig sgrol //
NK015(ba)003:182: phyag rgya'i lha mo n+airti ma //
NK015(ba)003:183: mchod pa'i lha mo gan+d+he ma /
NK015(ba)003:185: / 'bebs pa'i lha mo dril bu ma //
NK015(ba)003:186: tshe bdag byang phyogs gnod sbyin byang shar dbang ldan rdo rje mi 'gyur tshe yi dngos grub stsol //
NK015(ba)003:188: gzung sngags bzlas pa dang bcas pas mda' dar le rgan gyis g.yab cing tshe 'gug /
NK015(ba)003:191: tshe sa la nyams pa gser la bsdu //
NK015(ba)003:192: chu la nyams pa tsh+wa la bsdu //
NK015(ba)003:193: shing la nyams pa mngar la bsdu /
NK015(ba)003:195: / 'bru la nyams pa chang la bsdu //
NK015(ba)003:196: rtsi la nyams pa mar la bsdu //
NK015(ba)003:197: mi la nyams pa n+ri la bsdu /
NK015(ba)003:199: / 'bru lnga dang ni snying po lnga //
NK015(ba)003:200: gnas lnga dag tu byin brlabs na //
NK015(ba)003:201: rnal 'byor tshe la bar chad med //
NK015(ba)003:205: zhes pas steng 'og gi rgya gram gnyis kyi rtse
NK015(ba)003:206: mo a li k+aa li'i skud pas bcings te cis
NK015(ba)003:207: kyang mi shigs par gyur pa de nyid rang gi
NK015(ba)003:208: snying khar drangs te gnas par bsam mo //
NK015(ba)003:210: rang nyid lhar gsal ba snying kha'i tshe rten la thim /
NK015(ba)003:211: de yang dmigs med spros bral 'chi med gnyug ma'i rang bzhin la mnyam par bzhag nas /
NK015(ba)003:212: mi 'gyur cis kyang mi rig pa //
NK015(ba)003:213: stong pa'i go cha bla na med //
NK015(ba)003:214: mtshan ma'i spyod yul kun bcom nas //
NK015(ba)003:215: thams cad kun las rgyal bar gnas //
NK015(ba)003:216: ma byung mi gnas 'dus ma byas //
NK015(ba)003:217: chos kyi dbyings su tshe sbas pas //
NK015(ba)003:218: sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur //
NK015(ba)003:219: badz+ra k+aa w+aa tsi ra k+sha h+aum /
NK015(ba)003:220: zhes brjod cing slar yang lha skur langs te smon lam dang shis brjod kyang bya'o //
NK015(ba)003:221: gsum pa dbang gi cho ga ni /
NK015(ba)003:222: sgrub tshul bdag mdun dbyer med du byed pa sngar bzhin dang /
NK015(ba)003:223: tha dad du byed na bdag bskyed bzlas pa dang bcas pa song nas /
NK015(ba)003:224: mdun gyi sgrub rdzas la dmigs te /
NK015(ba)003:225: rang gi thugs ka nas e yam bam lam sum
NK015(ba)003:226: ram b+h+r+aum rnams spros nam mkha' rlung chu zhes sogs
NK015(ba)003:227: kyis rten dang brten pa bskyed pa spyan 'dren mchod
NK015(ba)003:228: bstod rnams bdag bskyed kyi tshig zur skabs thob bsgyur
NK015(ba)003:229: nas bya zhing / bzlas pa'i tshe /
NK015(ba)003:230: bdag gi thugs ka nas sngags kyi 'od zer gzungs thag la 'khril te song /
NK015(ba)003:232: de rnams kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas
NK015(ba)003:233: 'khor 'das snod bcud kyi tshe bcud thams cad bsdus
NK015(ba)003:234: nas bum pa'i nang du thim par bsam nas bzlas
NK015(ba)003:235: pa bya zhing / tshe rten sgom pa /
NK015(ba)003:239: h+aum zhes brjod pas lha rnams 'od du zhu ba tshe rten la thim /
NK015(ba)003:240: de yang rim bzhin zhu nas /
NK015(ba)003:241: +aahh+aum s+w+aa h+aa rnams su gyur par bsam mo //
NK015(ba)003:242: yang bdag bskyed yi dam gzhan la brten nas mdun
NK015(ba)003:243: bskyed bshad ma thag pa bzhin byed pa'i lag len
NK015(ba)003:244: yang snang ngo // gang ltar yang slob ma'i bya ba khrus byas /
NK015(ba)003:246: me tog bkye bsdu byas la /
NK015(ba)003:247: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi
NK015(ba)003:248: don du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob
NK015(ba)003:249: par bya / de ma thob kyi bar du yang
NK015(ba)003:250: phyi nang gi bar chad rnams zhi zhing bsam pa'i
NK015(ba)003:251: don thams cad gegs med du 'grub pa dang /
NK015(ba)003:252: khyad par du tshe'i 'gal rkyen thams cad zhi ba dang 'chi med tshe'i dngos grub thob par bya /
NK015(ba)003:253: de'i phyir du bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dpag
NK015(ba)003:254: tu med pa'i dbang bskur zab mo zhu snyam pa'i
NK015(ba)003:255: mos pa dang ldan pa'i sgo nas gsan 'tshal /
NK015(ba)003:256: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang sgrub pa'i
NK015(ba)003:257: rten phun sum tshogs pa ni dal 'byor gyi chos
NK015(ba)003:258: bco brgyad dang ldan pa'i mi lus rin po che
NK015(ba)003:260: de ni shin tu rnyed par dka' zhing rnyed pa don chen po dang ldan pa yin te /
NK015(ba)003:262: bde gshegs lam brten 'gro ba 'dren par chas gyur cing //
NK015(ba)003:263: sems kyi stobs chen mi yi rnyed pa gang yin pa'i //
NK015(ba)003:264: lam de lha dang klu yis mi rnyed lha min dang //
NK015(ba)003:265: mkha' lding rig 'dzin mi'am ci dang lto 'phyes min //
NK015(ba)003:266: mi yi dngos po shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed gyur nas //
NK015(ba)003:267: don du brnag pa gang yin de ni bstun te sgrub //
NK015(ba)003:269: de ltar thob pas mi chog /
NK015(ba)003:270: spyir 'dzam bu gling pa rnams kyi tshe la nges pa med cing /
NK015(ba)003:271: khyad par snyigs ma lnga bdo tshe'i snyigs ma'i mthar
NK015(ba)003:272: thug pas dus min du 'chi ba'i rkyen dang bar
NK015(ba)003:273: chad mang po dang ldan pa yin te /
NK015(ba)003:275: rin chen chos kyang dkon la rtag tu 'tshe ba'ang mang //
NK015(ba)003:276: zhes gsungs pa ltar spyir bar chad kyi rkyen mang
NK015(ba)003:277: zhing khyad par dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i rkyen
NK015(ba)003:278: ni / tshe dang las dang bsod nams zad pa ste rkyang zad gsum dang /
NK015(ba)003:279: de dag gnyis gnyis zad pa dang gsum las tshe zad pa la /
NK015(ba)003:280: tshe sgrub kyi cho ga dang /
NK015(ba)003:281: las zad pa la srog bslu nye'u 'don pa sogs dang /
NK015(ba)003:282: bsod nams zad pa la mchod sbyin la sogs pas gso ba dang /
NK015(ba)003:283: de dag gnyis mnyam du zad pa ni /
NK015(ba)003:284: gnyen po de dang des gso bar gsungs pa las /
NK015(ba)003:285: gso bya'i tshe nyid nyams pa'i rkyen /
NK015(ba)003:288: gso tshul dang bzhir rgyud las gsungs pa ste /
NK015(ba)003:290: dam nyams sems dkrug yi chad dngangs pa dang //
NK015(ba)003:291: zhe sdang drag pos rbod gtong tshar bcad dang //
NK015(ba)003:292: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa dang //
NK015(ba)003:293: gnas ngan dag tu gnas phab 'di dag ni //
NK015(ba)003:294: tshe nyams dbugs dngangs bgegs kyi dbang du 'gyur //
NK015(ba)003:297: 'khor la khro zhing sdug skad 'byin pa dang //
NK015(ba)003:298: bzhin 'gyur spyod lam rnams ni 'chal ba dang //
NK015(ba)003:299: slob dpon 'tsho byed dus las yol ba dang //
NK015(ba)003:300: kha zas rnams kyang yi gar mi 'ong ba /
NK015(ba)003:302: / 'di dag rnams ni nyams pa'i rtags yin no //
NK015(ba)003:305: ting 'dzin phra mo las su rung ba dang //
NK015(ba)003:306: rgyud kyi don la mkhas shing dbang thob pa //
NK015(ba)003:307: mthu byin che zhing dam can nye ba gsum /
NK015(ba)003:309: / 'di gsum gang gis bkug kyang khug par 'gyur //
NK015(ba)003:312: ji ltar gso ba'i thabs kyi cho ga ste zab
NK015(ba)003:313: rgyas gdams pa'i rnam grangs ji snyed cig mchis pa
NK015(ba)003:314: las / 'dir bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i
NK015(ba)003:315: rgyud las gsungs pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i sgrub
NK015(ba)003:316: thabs a nu yo ga dang rjes su 'brel ba
NK015(ba)003:317: shing rta chen po sangs rgyas gsang ba zhes bya
NK015(ba)003:318: ba mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen
NK015(ba)003:319: po de'i lugs bzhin du sgrub pa ni /
NK015(ba)003:320: lung bdun gyis 'ching bar mdzad pa ste /
NK015(ba)003:321: de yang bde 'dus tshe lung bdun pa las /
NK015(ba)003:322: tshe bca' tshe yi dkyil 'khor dang //
NK015(ba)003:323: tshe yi rang bzhin 'gug pa dang //
NK015(ba)003:324: tshe bcings tshe yi blan thabs dang //
NK015(ba)003:325: tshe yi dbang bskur bstim pa'o //
NK015(ba)003:326: zhes gsungs pa dang don gyi gnad gcig tu 'dus pa las /
NK015(ba)003:327: 'dir dbang bskur ba'i cho ga de nyid sgrub par byed pa la /
NK015(ba)003:328: slob dpon gyi bya ba rnams sngon du song /
NK015(ba)003:329: khyed rang rnams kyi ngo skal du gyur pa la
NK015(ba)003:330: tshe dbang zab mo zhu ba'i yon du man+dala phul
NK015(ba)003:331: mdzod / des kyang man+dala phul nas /
NK015(ba)003:332: gsol ba 'debs pa 'di'i rjes zlas mdzod /
NK015(ba)003:334: thar lam chen po bdag 'dod de //
NK015(ba)003:335: de nyid dbang dang dam tshig dang //
NK015(ba)003:336: mgon po dpa' bor skyabs song te //
NK015(ba)003:337: theg chen khang par gzhug pa dang //
NK015(ba)003:338: mkhyen rab ye shes bdag la stsol //
NK015(ba)003:340: de nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyun bshags bya ba ni /
NK015(ba)003:341: slob dpon tshe dpag med du gsal ba'i steng gi
NK015(ba)003:342: cha la brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams dang yi dam
NK015(ba)003:343: dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub
NK015(ba)003:344: sems dpa' thams cad sprin dpung gtibs pa bzhin bzhugs
NK015(ba)003:345: par bsam la tshig phyir sems rtse gcig pas 'di'i
NK015(ba)003:346: rjes zlos mdzod / rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal //
NK015(ba)003:349: slob ma skyil krung bcas nas rlung 'dzin du bcug la /
NK015(ba)003:350: slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas
NK015(ba)003:351: slob bu'i rnam smin gdos bcas kyi phung po mi
NK015(ba)003:353: stong pa'i ngang las rma byas btegs pa'i rin po
NK015(ba)003:354: che'i khri pad+ma nyi zla brtsegs pa'i steng du khyed
NK015(ba)003:355: rang +aam las mgon po tshe dang ye shes dpag
NK015(ba)003:356: tu med pa sogs mngon rtogs bzhin gtso bo bskyed
NK015(ba)003:358: h+aum las 'od zer 'phros pas sangs rgyas dang byang
NK015(ba)003:359: chub sems dpa' thams cad tshe dpag tu med pa'i
NK015(ba)003:360: lha tshogs kyi rnam par spyan drangs khyed rang gi
NK015(ba)003:361: spyi bo nas sib sib thim par sgoms shig byas
NK015(ba)003:363: a be sha ya a +aah zhes btags pa bzla zhing spos dang rol mo bya /
NK015(ba)003:364: tish+tha badz+ra zhes brtan par byas nas /
NK015(ba)003:365: slob ma tshe lha yab yum du gsal ba'i yum
NK015(ba)003:366: gyi mkha' nang du slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas
NK015(ba)003:367: h+aum spros pa rdo rje rgya gram gnyis su gyur
NK015(ba)003:368: pa'i sogs nas +aa li k+aa la'i skud pas bcings
NK015(ba)003:369: te cis kyang mi shigs par gyur pa de nyid
NK015(ba)003:370: yum gyi mkha' nas snying gar drangs te gnas par
NK015(ba)003:371: mos pa rnams shar ltar bya zhing /
NK015(ba)003:372: bsdu na ye shes pa brtan par byas pa'i rjes
NK015(ba)003:373: nyid du gsol 'debs la 'jug ste gang ltar yang
NK015(ba)003:374: / dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid //
NK015(ba)003:375: rdo rje slob dpon dgongs su gsol //
NK015(ba)003:376: dbang bskur bdud rtsi chen po nyid //
NK015(ba)003:377: bdag la rab tu stsal du gsol //
NK015(ba)003:380: bum pa'i nang du 'khor 'das kyi tshe bcud thams cad /
NK015(ba)003:381: +amo dkar po +aahdamara po h+aum sngon po s+w+aa ser
NK015(ba)003:382: po h+aa ljang gu rnams kyi rnam par gnas pa
NK015(ba)003:383: las yi ge de dag mar me gcig las gnyis
NK015(ba)003:384: chad kyi tshul du rim pa bzhin byung ba khyed
NK015(ba)003:385: rang gi gnas lngar thim pa 'od du zhu ba'i
NK015(ba)003:386: dwangs ma snying ga'i tshe rten gyi n+ri la thim
NK015(ba)003:387: pas tshe dang bsod nams dpal dang gzi brjod thams
NK015(ba)003:388: cad rgyas par mos su bcug la /
NK015(ba)003:389: bum pa spyi bor bzhag ste /
NK015(ba)003:391: zla gam dmar po rdo rje tshe yi dbang /
NK015(ba)003:393: / +aa yu dmar po yongs su 'gyur med de //
NK015(ba)003:394: mi mchog nges pa'i tshe mchog gang yin pa //
NK015(ba)003:395: rigs kyi bu khyod dbang mchog thob par shog /
NK015(ba)003:396: pun+ye sogs brjod cing bum chu blud /
NK015(ba)003:397: slad yang gnas lngar rim par bzhag la /
NK015(ba)003:398: ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK015(ba)003:399: de bzhin gsang ba gsum las byung //
NK015(ba)003:400: de bzhin rigs kyi dbang bskur bas //
NK015(ba)003:401: dbang bskur snang ba chen po sbyin //
NK015(ba)003:402: bu d+d+ha k+aa la sha a b+hi shiny+tsa /
NK015(ba)003:403: ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK015(ba)003:404: pad+ma gsang ba gsum las byung //
NK015(ba)003:405: pad+ma rigs kyi dbang bskur bas //
NK015(ba)003:406: dbang bskur snang ba chen po sbyin //
NK015(ba)003:407: pad+ma k+aa la sha a b+hi shiny+tsa +aah ji snyed
NK015(ba)003:408: sangs rgyas rdo rje gsang rdo rje rigs kyi dbang
NK015(ba)003:409: skur snang ba badz+ra k+aa la sha a b+hi shiny+tsa
NK015(ba)003:410: h+aum / ji snyed sangs rgyas rin chen gsang rin
NK015(ba)003:411: chen rigs kyi dbang bskur +amo rat+na k+aa la sha
NK015(ba)003:413: ji snyed sangs rgyas las rab las kyi rigs kyi
NK015(ba)003:414: dbang bskur snang ba +amo karma k+aa la sha a
NK015(ba)003:415: b+hi shiny+tsa h+aa / zhes dbang bskur nas sngar bzhin
NK015(ba)003:416: tshe'i mthu dpal thob pa'i nges shes bskyed du bcug
NK015(ba)003:417: b+hi shiny+tsa h+aa / la / bcom ldan mgon po rdo rje tshe dpag med //
NK015(ba)003:418: sogs sku'i bstod pa'i tshig mtha' ma /
NK015(ba)003:419: mnyam nyid rdo rje'i sku yi bkra shis shog /
NK015(ba)003:420: ces bsgyur bas shis brjod kyi me tog 'thor /
NK015(ba)003:421: tshe 'brang lhar gsal ba khyed rang gi spyi bor
NK015(ba)003:422: byon de'i sku las byang sems 'chi med ye shes
NK015(ba)003:423: kyi bdud rtsir babs pas lus thams cad gang rdo
NK015(ba)003:424: rje tshe'i dngos grub thob par mos la /
NK015(ba)003:427: skye shi med pa rdo rje tshe yi dbang //
NK015(ba)003:428: skal ldan rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas //
NK015(ba)003:429: tshe ring nad med phun sum tshogs gyur te //
NK015(ba)003:430: rtag tu skye 'chi'i sdug bsngal bral bar shog /
NK015(ba)003:435: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bden pa dang /
NK015(ba)003:436: dbang rdzas nus pa'i mthu byin dang /
NK015(ba)003:437: bdag gi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i mthus //
NK015(ba)003:438: rigs kyi bu 'di la dbang bskur bas tshe ring ba /
NK015(ba)003:442: ston brgya mthong ba'i dbang dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)003:444: bcom ldan mgon po sogs kyi mthar /
NK015(ba)003:445: mnyam nyid rdo rje'i gsung gi bkra shis shog /
NK015(ba)003:448: khyod rang gi snying ga'i tshe rten rnams 'od du
NK015(ba)003:449: zhu ba'i rkyen gyis rang lhar gsal ba yang 'od
NK015(ba)003:450: du zhu nas yi ge a dkar po gcig tu
NK015(ba)003:451: gyur / a zhes brjod pas de yang dmigs med
NK015(ba)003:452: spros bral 'chi med gnyug ma'i gnas lugs la mnyam
NK015(ba)003:453: gyur / par zhog mdzod / mi 'gyur cis kyang mi shigs pa //
NK015(ba)003:456: bcom ldan mgon po sogs kyi mthar /
NK015(ba)003:457: mnyam nyid rdo rje'i thugs kyi bkra shis shog /
NK015(ba)003:459: de nas mthar brten tshe'i rdzas byin pa ni /
NK015(ba)003:461: tshe yi rang bzhin gzhal yas khang //
NK015(ba)003:462: rdo rje rgya gram nyi zla'i tog /
NK015(ba)003:463: lha dang rdzas dang sngags kyis gtams /
NK015(ba)003:466: rdo rje slob ma khyod la sbyin //
NK015(ba)003:467: pun+ye sogs brjod cing 'brang rgyas kyi mtha'i ril bu lag g.yas su gtad pa bzar bcug /
NK015(ba)003:469: nga ni lha mo gos dkar mo //
NK015(ba)003:470: bum pa rin chen gzhal yas khang //
NK015(ba)003:471: bum pa mi 'gyur tshe yis bkang //
NK015(ba)003:472: yi dam lha la tshe yang zhus //
NK015(ba)003:473: phyogs skyong lag nas tshe yang phrog /
NK015(ba)003:474: mi yi snying po tshe yang bsdus //
NK015(ba)003:475: rtsi bcud dang ni sman gyi bcud //
NK015(ba)003:476: phyogs bzhi dag nas bkug bkug nas //
NK015(ba)003:477: mtshams bzhi dag nas rab bsdus te /
NK015(ba)003:480: rdo rje slob ma khyod la sbyin //
NK015(ba)003:481: pun+ye sogs brjod cing tshe chang lag g.yon du sbyin la 'thung du bcug /
NK015(ba)003:482: 'jig rten 'dren pa'i sogs kyi shis pa brjod /
NK015(ba)003:483: de ltar tshe dbang bskur bas tshe mi shigs pa'i rdo rje /
NK015(ba)003:485: mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur te /
NK015(ba)003:486: 'chi ba med pa tshe'i dngos grub la dbang 'byor bar gyur cig /
NK015(ba)003:487: ces brjod slob ma'i rjes kyi bya ba dang /
NK015(ba)003:488: dkyil 'khor gyi rjes chog ni gzhan dang 'dra'o //
NK015(ba)003:490: sgrub thabs sangs rgyas gsang ba'i lugs //
NK015(ba)003:491: rog ston gong ma'i legs bshad kyi //
NK015(ba)003:493: tshe dpag med lung lugs kyi sgrub thabs sangs rgyas
NK015(ba)003:494: gsang ba'i bka' srol bzhin bshad pa'i le tshan gter
NK015(ba)003:495: chen 'gyur med rdo rje'i gsung sgrub thabs 'dod 'jo'i
